data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1
data.short_description: Sending newline in markdown will not appear(but is still there) if there's a message cluster
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Send a newline in markdown, eg \`\n\` with the \n being a newline - Observe how it doesn't appear - Delete the first message - It appears with a flash
